website_summaries.verdict: This machine performs well enough, but other fax machines yield similar results at friendlier prices.

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Fax
customer_reviews.text: It is ten times faster sending a fax than my older Brother fax machine. Hopefully, it will last as long as my Brother fax! My one con is it does not automatically transmit, you have to wait for a fax tone, then press send.
customer_reviews.author: larry mackie

customer_reviews.title: This particular fax unit is one of the best products I've see yet
customer_reviews.text: This particular fax unit is one of the best products I've see yet. As an independent administrator for a number of corps here in NYC, most of my clients in the past have relied on "popular" ink jet brands that are not only expensive to operate, but lack in image quality and are many times, unreliable when connecting to newer "digital" fax lines. This one vastly surpasses not only in the volume of pages provided as a laser printer, but offers an impressive image quality when used either as a fax or copier that's very close to an original. This Panasonic fax/copier, is an excellent price with a quality output that's hard to beat, even with the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok Machine, Had Issues At First.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I purchased. The product is great, when it works. The first two of these I bought, the cartridge was not functional or the front would not close. Finally the third worked, but after much struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Allison W

customer_reviews.title: second time was ok
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived and soon stopped working. Replacement has been fine though
customer_reviews.author: Anatole Gutowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A dependable top performer which has been trouble free for five plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works alright but has occasional issues sending pages.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but sometimes when faxing it'll accidentally pull in extra page, requiring you to cancel the fax and start over again. Not sure if this is because of the quality of paper I'm using or from static electricity in the paper--but my older fax didn't have these issues. Receiving has been fine, and I've had no issues with transmissions over both my VOIP and POTS lines.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not good this fax machine came to me with lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not good this fax machine came to me with lot of problems, didn't work for me I return this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This fax machine is cheaply made and does not work properly. We have been through three machines in less than one year. Each machine makes a terrible squealing noise that reminds you of metal on metal brakes and nails on a chalk board. Panasonic has replaced it twice and the machine I received today still makes the noise and is cracked. I would strongly recommend you not purchase this even though the price seems to warrant it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Demers

customer_reviews.title: High quality fax
customer_reviews.text: This fax machine also works as a copier. It has many helpful features to make faxing easy, readable and reliable. The only complicated part is installing the cartridge (since it must be done in low light... due to the photo sensitive features of the cartridge). I have this hooked up to my main phone line and it does not accept faxes unless I hit "auto answer" That way I can use the same phone line for phone calls and faxing!
customer_reviews.author: Dhivehi Dialogue

customer_reviews.title: I worked good for one year
customer_reviews.text: Quit working 1 yr and one month after purchase. We occasionally use our fax machine so this is not an item we beat to death. Customer service from the manufacture stinks. I worked good for one year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience with this fax machine
customer_reviews.text: Very bad experience with this fax machine. This machine does not fax more than 2 pages and is extremely slow. Within 2 months it has started making noises as if it was 10 years old. Would advice not to buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: reliable easy to use machine... cheap cartridges are easy to get right here at amazon
customer_reviews.author: d arivas

customer_reviews.title: kx fl421
customer_reviews.text: It does what I purchased it for. Have had no problem with it so far either in istallation or in functionning
customer_reviews.author: M. Jerome

customer_reviews.title: This was not the product I thought it was. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not the product I thought it was. It did not have an answering device, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Terris

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy operation
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy so far.Set up and assembly was easy. Print quality is good. It is bit On the expensive side but it is very well built. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ihab R Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work good and I just love how it works
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the small toner
customer_reviews.text: This product was not a well constructed as a Brother that I have. I do not like the small toner.
customer_reviews.author: Zaron Van Meer

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS READY
customer_reviews.text: A NECCESSARY PIECE OF EQIUPMENT FOR A SMALL BUSINESS. EASY TO USE AND A QUICK WAY TO GET YOUR MESSAGES SENT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked for 2 years and now the drum is gone! is that a product for 2 years only???
customer_reviews.author: cila schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Huray for the Panasonic Fax.  Had ordered a Brother first, but it was as if designed by a committee.
customer_reviews.text: Great fax. There was a learning curve to get this working, so what is new ? Liked the feature that the user can set the resolution of the print on all pages to be sent. There are a lot of optional functions. I find this true of many Japan products.
customer_reviews.author: AUGUST SHINWALD

customer_reviews.title: Best fax I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I went through 8 different fax machines over 25 years, and none of them printed incoming pages as sharp and clear as this one.
customer_reviews.author: LP6

customer_reviews.title: This item was used, didn't come with ink ~ ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was used, didn't come with ink ~ was in a pinch for time....but all the information was in the memory of someone elses office. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Limbrick

customer_reviews.title: By far the worst ever fax machine
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst ever fax machine. Trouble at day one. Poor Poor customer service through Mfg Panasonic. Continued to limp along and then finally after 3 more calls to Panasonic and no satisfaction (obvious they read from a script) called Amazon. Amazon refunded my money and I am rid of this piece of junk. Bought another from Amazon another mfg and absolutely love and it worked right out of the box!!! Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to find time to set it up. Seems complicated and time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: My secretaries were unhappy Lots of jamming Went back to ...
customer_reviews.text: My secretaries were unhappy Lots of jamming Went back to the more expensive Brother fax
customer_reviews.author: DCD

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT record messages!!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected an "All In One" to record messages as well as send and receive fax. NOT!!! I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Poor design & no tech support
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to the letter. The toner cartridge would not fit. My wife & I struggled with it for awhile & then called tech support. Panasonic mis-routed my call twice. When I finally got to the right person she had no ideas. Seller won't take the item back so I'm stuck. If Amazon lets this decision stand, I will do a lot less shopping at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: oldualer

customer_reviews.title: Wished her a good evening and hung up
customer_reviews.text: This is Rich, Barb's husband. SAVE YOUR MONEY!! Very poorly engineered, as the toner does not install (fit) into the drum. If you try to reinstall the toner, it will get all over anything within ten feet. NO TECHNICAL SUPPOR AVAILABLET!! They argued with me for 45 minutes that it was not their fault. Finally a supervisor authorized a new fax be sent. But on my return instructions I was told not to send back any accessories, including the toner or drum. Which of course was the problem! I called back and another person (Europe, Asia?) said accessories were not covered and I can keep them. Wished her a good evening and hung up.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Woznicki

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Started out really liking this unit but paper jams around the fuser roller (not unusual) require disassembling the fuser unit. After the 4th jam the unit stopped working completely. Find another brand that's more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: Paper jams while trying to fax. This is our second replacement. We need to babysit all of our faxes. The first machine we had would pull the papers in at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: SHIRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reliable fax machine, and this one meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: ... spatial skills and the stars have to be in perfect alignment to get this thing together
customer_reviews.text: You need incredible spatial skills and the stars have to be in perfect alignment to get this thing together. I destroyed the drum, broke the toner cartridge, and said the f-word about 25 times. It probably takes two people to do this. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Panasonic Advanced Fax Communications with Laser Print Quality (KX-FL421),Black
product_meta.description:
Panasonic KX-FL421 Advanced Fax Communications with Laser Print Quality

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Introducing the Panasonic KX-FL421 
Improve efficiency and save space with the Panasonic KX-FL421 compact, multi-function laser fax machine. Fax, call and copy all from one unit and save money by potentially replacing up to three pieces of office equipment.

Good things come in small packagesâ€¦

Designed to fit on your desk or worktable, the KX-FL421 may look small (W 14.2â€� x H 8.6â€�) but it can cut your costs while improving office workflow. The KX-FL421 comes standard with a 33.6 kbps Super G3 Fax Modem that can transmit documents as fast as 4 seconds per page. *1 
More Features 

Caller ID Compatible*2 - You can view the callerâ€™s name and/or number on the LCD screen. 10-CPM Laser Copier - Crisp laser class copies at a fast rate of 10 copies per minute.*3 250-Sheet Paper Tray - Top loading paper tray holds up to 250 pages for high-volume fax reception. 150-Page Document Memory*4 - Built in memory stores incoming or outgoing documents for document broadcasts to multiple locations or for out-of-paper reception. Error Correction Mode (ECM) - Error Correction Mode assures clear fax transmissions, by checking every document line by line. Broadcasting - Allows you to send multiple documents to multiple locations in a single operation. Up to 3 separate calling groups can be saved for frequent fax transmissions. Why Wait? : Dual Access Operation 
The KX-FL421 allows you to perform two operations simultaneously, increasing productivity and cutting back on wait times. For example, if the machine is busy transmitting or receiving a fax, dual access operation allows you to begin scanning and storing your next fax job into the the document memory until the first process is complete. Itâ€™s like a SPAM folder for your fax machine 
Save time and paper by avoiding unwanted faxes. The KX-FL421 comes equipped with a Junk Fax Prohibitor that prevents fax reception from calls that donâ€™t show caller information. Additionally, block unwanted numbers by programming them in to the built-in fax prohibitor list. Companion Products KX-FAT88
Toner Cartridge KX-FAD89
Drum Unit Specifications Facsimile Compatibility: Super G3 Printing method: Laser Effective scanning width: 208 mm (8.2") Effective printing width: Letter / Legal: 208 mm (8.2"), A4: 202 mm (7.9") Resolution: Standard / Fine / Photo / Super Fine / Mixed Paper size: Letter / Legal / A4 Modem speed: 33.6 kbps - 2.4 kbps with automatic fallback Transmission speed: Approx. 4 s/page*1 in ECM-MMR mode Compression system: MH / MR / MMR Document memory: 2.5 MB (Reception: 100 pages / Transmission: 150 pages)*1 User LOGO transmission: Up to 30 character fax header Fax number registration: Up to 20 digits LCD readout: 16 digits / 2 lines Copier Copy speed: Approx. 10 cpm*3 Multiple copy: Up to 99 copies Enlarge / Reduce: 50 - 200% (in 5% increments) Collate feature: Available Integrated Telephone Dial mode: Tone (DTMF) / Pulse Callback feature: Available*2 Incoming call ringer: Ring tone 1, 2, 3 Monitor volume: 8 levels Handset volume: 3 levels Flash: Available Caller ID: FSK compatible*2 General Power Consumption: Standby: 2 W, Copy: 240 W, Maximum: 950 W (fuser lamp turns on) Power Supply: AC 120 V, 60 Hz Dimensions (W x D x H): 14.2" x 14" x 8.6" Weight: Approx. 16.3 lb (Unit only) UPC Code: 885170024854 

*1. Based on ITU-T No.1 test chart in Standard resolution, Actual transmission speed may vary based on various conditions and machine settings. *2. Requires subscription to fee-based telephone company service. *3. Continuous copy of a single original. *4. 5% page coverage. *5. The drum longevity is tested by 20-sheet continued printout intervals.
feature_bullets: Super G3 Fax with 33.6 kbps Modem
Top loading paper tray holds up to 250 pages for high-volume fax reception
